short_description: pjez unik is an art gallery based in antwerp, belgium.
long_description: pjez unik wants to offer a wide spectrum of contemporary art from national & international professional artists. the concept of pjez unik is unique in belgium. it's an innovative and refreshing way to present art to the general public. pjez unik consists of two parts: the collection and the exhibition room. the collection offers a wide range of contemporary art from different national and international artists. all professionals, by the way. all artworks are unique pieces, so if you see something you like, don't hesitate too long. pjez unik offers artwork in different price ranges. after several years of experiencing the gallery world behind the scenes, we came up with a new concept to counter certain challenges that most galleries were facing. each character of the name is in a different font, to symbolise the uniqueness and multitude of the art we want to present. on october 25th, we organized the first art-hunt through the historic center of antwerp. the gallery for everyone affordable & contemporary art.
